posts.post_content:
With an odd loophole and this you can actually exploit stolen cards (like red [Shared Fate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shared Fate) cards, a mind-controlled firebreather) in EDH decks where ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) is not in your commander's color identity.  
  
Plus they look f\*\*king awesome to boot.
posts.html:
